name: BetStars: Sports Betting
description:
Download and get started today for free to legally bet in New Jersey on all your favorite teams, sports, and players. BetStars has you covered with world class promotions, great pricing, mobile first features, and the trust of one of the world’s largest gaming companies in the world, PokerStars.

AVAILABLE SPORTS

- NFL
- NCAAF
- Basketball
- Baseball
- Hockey
- Tennis
- Golf
- Soccer
- & much, much more

PLAYER FIRST PROMOTIONS

- Risk free bet up to $500
- Bet $25 get $5 free every week
- Added bonus money on all parlays
- Refund MLB bets that lose in extra innings
- Play during Tuesday Happy Hour to win free bets
- Plus, additional promotions run every day!

SPORTSBOOK IN YOUR POCKET

- Bet all the traditional ways plus more
- Take advantage of our industry leading Super Boosts to give you the best odds
- Bet in-game while the action is live
- Cash out your bet early to lock in your profits
- Take advantage of Spin & Bet and potentially 10x your return
- Tweet us at #CustomBet and we will price your personalized bets

This is a legal, real money gambling app in New Jersey. Users must be 21+ to play. Terms and Conditions apply.
